PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions about Our Home Delivery Service
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: How fast can I get my delivery?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: We offer various delivery speeds, from same-day to standard shipping. Delivery times depend on your location and the items ordered. You can view estimated delivery times at checkout.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: What types of items can I have delivered?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Our app supports delivery of a wide range of items including groceries, prepared meals, household essentials, electronics, and more. Check the app for a full list of available products and participating stores in your area.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: How do I track my delivery?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Once your order is confirmed, you can easily track its progress in real-time through our app. You'll receive notifications for order updates and can even see the live location of your delivery driver on the map.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: What if I'm not home when my delivery arrives?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: No worries! You can set delivery preferences in the app, such as leaving the package at your door or with a neighbor. For perishable items, we recommend being available during the delivery window or arranging a safe drop-off location.

FEATURE_1_BODY: Experience the convenience of swift doorstep delivery, bringing your favorite items right to you in record time.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Browse through an extensive catalog of products from local stores and restaurants, all available for home delivery.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Stay informed with live order tracking, allowing you to monitor your delivery's progress from start to finish.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Tailor your orders to your exact preferences, with options for special instructions and substitutions.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Enjoy peace of mind with our contactless delivery option, ensuring a safe and hygienic transaction.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Rest easy knowing our dedicated support team is available around the clock to assist you with any queries or concerns.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Got questions? We've got answers. Find out more about our home delivery service.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: How does your home delivery service work?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app connects you with local delivery drivers who pick up your items from stores or restaurants and bring them directly to your doorstep. Simply place an order, track it in real-time, and enjoy the convenience of home delivery.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: We currently operate in major metropolitan areas across the country. Check our app for specific coverage in your location. We're constantly expanding, so stay tuned for updates!
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Delivery fees vary based on distance, order size, and time of day. You'll see the exact fee before confirming your order. We also offer a subscription service for frequent users that provides free delivery on eligible orders.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: What if there's an issue with my order?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: We strive for 100% customer satisfaction. If there's any problem with your order, please use the 'Help' section in our app to report the issue. Our customer service team will assist you promptly and ensure a resolution.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Can I schedule deliveries in advance?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Absolutely! Our app allows you to schedule deliveries up to a week in advance. This feature is perfect for planning ahead or ensuring you receive your items at a time that's most convenient for you.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_TITLE: Delicious Meals, Delivered to Your Doorstep
STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_SUBTITLE: Enjoy restaurant-quality food from the comfort of your home. Order now and experience convenience at its finest!
